title: The Harp in the South [a discussion]
creator_credit: Barry Washington and Country Education Project
brief_description: Ruth Park’s social documentary is the basis for this program hosted by Richard McRoberts. The program attempts to present the background and the setting together with its genesis in Ruth Park’s own life experiences.
